page.title: 06SHOPS IN CARTMEL - 3
page.content: {TRADE SHOPS (3) The Spar grocers shop is run by Mr. George Airey. It has been a Spar shop for 13 years, although there has been a shop on the site for 80 years. It was formerly a Co-operative store. The Spar is very popular with school children. Every day 60 to 100 children go in to buy sweets etc. Tinned goods are the items with the hightest sales. The shop is now self service and has a check out. In contrast to other shops in the area, half day closing is on a Tuesday afternoon rather than a Thursday. This is done to help customers, as there will always be a store open locally. {Reported by Claire Heppenstall, aged {10 { }
